source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_SEQ_00<tab>Ryosen has lost sight of something important.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_SEQ_00<tab>ナマイ村のリョウセンは、誰かを探しているようだ。
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_01<tab>人狼族の野臥と話し襲われたら討伐

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the mugworts to Ryosen's grandson.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_03<tab>リョウセンの孫に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4801 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the waterweed to Ryosen's grandson.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_05<tab>リョウセンの孫に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4901 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_000<tab>I have lost my grandchild! Please, help me search for him.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_000<tab>そこの旅人さんや！
よければ、孫を探すのを手伝ってはくれんか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_001<tab>He was right next to me until a short while ago. I cannot believe I lost sight of him so easily.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_001<tab>ちょいと前まで近くにいたはずだったんじゃが、
目を離した隙に、姿が見えなくなってしまっての。
わしとしたことが、恥ずかしい……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_002<tab>He was asking a lot of questions about the One River; perhaps he went there searching for something.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_002<tab>無二江のことを大人に聞いていたそうじゃから、
川岸の方に行ったのかもしれぬ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_003<tab>Though, I truly hope that is not the case. I have heard that a group of Lupin looters roam the area of late. Please search along the One River for my grandson. I shall continue to look for him here.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_003<tab>あの辺は人狼族の野臥も出没すると聞く……。
すまぬが、無二江の川岸を見てきてくれぬか？
わしも、このあたりを引き続き探してみるゆえな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_004<tab>Please search for my grandson by the One River. I shall continue to look for him here.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_004<tab>あの辺は人狼族の野臥も出没すると聞く……。
すまぬが、無二江の川岸を見てきてくれぬか？
わしも、このあたりを引き続き探してみるゆえな……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_010<tab>Grandfather is looking for me, you say? But I cannot go back just yet! I am still searching for that which was taken from me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_010<tab>えっ、おじいちゃんが僕を探してるって？
どうしよう……実はね、集めているものがあったんだけれど、
それを取られちゃって、今からまた集めようと思ってたんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_011<tab>I was minding my own business, gathering mugworts, when some nasty Lupin stole them right out of my hands!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_011<tab>ヨモギが欲しくて、ここまできて摘んでいたんだけれど、
人狼さんたちに、取って行かれちゃったんだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_012<tab>Would you ask the Lupin if they would give me back my plants? You'll find them on the other side of the river.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_012<tab><var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>、お願い。
川向こうに渡った人狼さんたちに、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4801 /var>」を、
返してくれるよう、お願いしてきてくれないかな？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_013<tab>Would you ask the Lupin if they would give me back my plants? You'll find them on the other side of the river.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_013<tab>川向こうに渡った人狼さんたちに、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4801 /var>」を、
返してくれるよう、お願いしてきてくれないかな？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_014<tab>Where could he have gone to? Oh, I do hope he is safe...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_014<tab>孫が心配じゃ……。
無事に帰ってこれたら、ええんじゃが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_WEREWOLF02733_000_020<tab>You would have us return some insignificant child's mugworts? Do not make me laugh.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_WEREWOLF02733_000_020<tab>なに？
子どもから取り上げた、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4801 /var>を返してほしいだと？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_WEREWOLF02733_000_021<tab>This whole area belongs to us, including any plants that may happen to be plucked by a child of man.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_WEREWOLF02733_000_021<tab>ここは、我ら人狼の縄張り。
縄張り内にあるものは、すべて我ら人狼のもの。
ヒトよ……早く、ここから立ち去れ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_030<tab>I wonder if the Lupin will give back my plants...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_030<tab>僕の「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4801 /var>」、
人狼さんたち、返してくれたかな……？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_040<tab>Did you get them to return my mugworts?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_040<tab>人狼さんたち、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4801 /var>」を返してくれた？

TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_041<tab>ありがとう！
人狼さんたちも、<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>が話したら、
わかってくれたんだね！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_042<tab>I was trying to collect plants to make some medicine. I read about it in one of my grandfather's botanicy books! There are so many sick people in the village. I just wanted to help.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_042<tab>実は、おじいちゃんの持ってる本草学って巻物に書いてあった、
傷薬を作ってあげたくて、それに必要な材料を集めてるんだ。
村には怪我をしてる人がいっぱいいるから……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_043<tab>There is one more thing I need for the medicine: waterweed. I tried to fish some out of the river earlier with a pole. But I didn't have much luck. Could you get some for me?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_043<tab>それでね、ヨモギのほかに、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4901 /var>」もほしいんだけど、
僕が棒を使っても、川底に届かなくて困ってるんだ。
<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>なら、採れたりしないかな？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_044<tab>There is one more thing I need for the medicine: waterweed. It's found at the bottom of rivers. Could you get some for me?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_044<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4901 /var>」もほしいんだけど、
僕が棒を使っても、川底に届かなくて困ってるんだ。
<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>なら、採れたりしないかな？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_051<tab>Yay! Now I have everything I need!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_051<tab>すごい、採れたんだね！？
これで村のみんなのために、傷薬を作ってあげられるよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_052<tab>I'll go back to Grandfather now. Thanks for your help!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_052<tab>それじゃ、僕はおじいちゃんのところに帰るよ！
<var 08 E905 ((お姉ちゃん)) ((お兄ちゃん)) /var>、ありがとね！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_060<tab>My grandson is at last returned! He told me all about how you helped him gather the ingredients he needed to make medicine.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_060<tab>やや、旅人さん！
先ほど無事に孫が戻ってきて、薬の材料集めを、
旅人さんに助けていただいたという話を聞きましたぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_061<tab>While I am glad he has grown to be a kind-hearted boy, there is still much he need learn about discipline and manners.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_061<tab>優しい心を持った孫に育ってくれて、嬉しいものの、
慎重さと礼節については、厳しく躾けなければなりませんな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_062<tab>However, those Lupin should really know better than to steal from a mere child. Their race was once famed for being loyal vassals to some of Doma's mightiest warlords.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_062<tab>それにしても、嘆かわしい話じゃ……。
武の民として知られる人狼族は、ドマの豪族に平定され、
その家臣として忠実に仕えておったというに……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_063<tab>When Doma was crushed by the Empire some of them managed to escape, choosing to live as bandits.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_063<tab>ところがドマが滅びると、
一部の者は、帝国の支配からも逃れ、
野盗のような生き方をするようになってしまった。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_064<tab>It pains me to see a race once so proud fall so low. Something else we have Garlemald to thank for, I suppose.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_064<tab>まして、子どもが採ったヨモギを奪うとは堕ちたものよ。
誇り高き武人であった人狼族は、どこへ行ってしまったのか……。
それもこれも、帝国の支配の悪影響ですな。
